articles.title: Smoking Takes a Toll On Male and Female Reproductive Health, Doctor Explains - India.com
articles.description: Smoking has negative effects on men and women. It damages the genetic material in eggs and sperm leading to fertility problems. A couple might find it difficult to conceive.
